author: Sharon Begley
title: Influential coronavirus model uses flawed methods and shouldn't guide US policies, critics say
description: The IHME projections were used by the Trump administration in developing national guidelines to mitigate the outbreak. Now, they are reportedly influencing White House thinking on how and when to "re-open" the country, STAT News reports.
content: A widely followed model for projecting Covid-19 deaths in the U.S. is producing results that have been bouncing up and down like an unpredictable fever, and now epidemiologists are criticizing it as flawed and misleading for both the public and policy makers.… [+10202 chars]
